sentences.english: This is Mr. Linghu say "sci-fi magazine, " magical realism of play.
sentences.chinese: 這就是令狐先生說的《科幻雜誌》所玩的魔幻現實。

sentences.english: Modern magic fictions , seemingly absurd though, possess the essence of an intense reality-orientation.
sentences.chinese: 代魔幻小說雖看似荒誕但也有着很強的現實指歸性。

sentences.english: Others too have seen spirits in the Enchanted Woods.
sentences.chinese: 也有其他人在這魔幻森林裏見過精靈鬼怪。

sentences.english: I hope I can step into Macau to visti this magical city.
sentences.chinese: 我希望可以踏入澳門這座魔幻之城旅遊。

sentences.english: Airline executives should rush to the Haunted Mansion in the Magic Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司的經理們應該直接衝向魔幻世界的鬼屋。

sentences.english: The old Square Street tells every visitor a magic dream with its unique style.
sentences.chinese: 四方街向每一個遊客傾訴着魔幻般的夢。

sentences.english: More lightly go properly natural can absorb magic dent.
sentences.chinese: 更爲輕靈天然能吸收魔幻力。

sentences.english: In short, strange, magic in general are far behind.
sentences.chinese: 總之，千奇百怪，一般魔幻都望塵莫及。

sentences.english: Every changing colorway is the most beautiful part of the magic hour.
sentences.chinese: 雲彩的變動是魔幻時刻中最動人的地方。

sentences.english: Also, what is your relationship to magical realism?
sentences.chinese: 還有，你與魔幻現實主義的關係如何？

sentences.english: Dressed in diving suits, they walk around in the magic world, lighted by the lamps of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 身着潛水衣，他們借船的燈照亮，走進這魔幻的世界。

definition: science fiction/abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]
